channel.title: Containers on jellyparks
channel.description: Recent content in Containers on jellyparks

item.title: compromised_container_analysis_primer
item.description: This post is going to focus on the triaging and analysis of a container that has been compromised. PIDs Before we get into the actual analysis lets start with a quick overview of how processes exist in containers. When you run PS inside a container you typically get a very short list of running processes and not all of the processes that are currently running on the underlying host.
